error.message: Class Drupal\workbench_moderation\Event\WorkbenchModerationTransitionEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead

Call to deprecated method assertNoText() of class Drupal\Tests\workbench_moderation\Functional\ModerationStateTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use - $this->assertSession()->responseNotContains() for non-HTML responses, like XML or Json. - $this->assertSession()->pageTextNotContains() for HTML responses. Unlike the deprecated assertNoText(), the passed text should be HTML decoded, exactly as a human sees it in the browser.
